title: Differential Equation with slope field part - a

content.question:
The slope field for the given differential equation is shown below. Sketch the solution curve that passes through the point (3, -1) and sketch the solution curve that passes through the point (1, 2) .

(Note: The points (3, -1) and (1, 2) are indicated in the figure.)
